verses.verse: Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "See, <S%H7200><s%> I make <S%H5414><s%> you [as] God <S%H430><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and your brother <S%H251><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall be your prophet. <S%H5030><s%>

"You shall speak <S%H1696><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that I command <S%H6680><s%> you, and your brother <S%H251><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall speak <S%H1696><s%> to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> that he let <S%H7971><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> go <S%H7971><s%> out of his land. <S%H776><s%>
"But I will harden <S%H7185><s%> Pharaoh's heart <S%H3820><s%> that I may multiply <S%H7235><s%> My signs <S%H226><s%> and My wonders <S%H4159><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

"When Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> will not listen <S%H8085><s%> to you, then I will lay <S%H5414><s%> My hand <S%H3027><s%> on Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and bring <S%H3318><s%> out My hosts, <S%H6635><s%> My people <S%H5971><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> by great <S%H1419><s%> judgments. <S%H8201><s%>

"And the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> when I stretch <S%H5186><s%> out My hand <S%H3027><s%> on Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and bring <S%H3318><s%> out the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from their midst. <S%H8432><s%>"
So Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> [it;] as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> them, thus <S%H3651><s%> they did. <S%H6213><s%>
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> was eighty <S%H8084><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> eighty-three, when they spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Pharaoh. <S%H6547><s%>
Now the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"When <S%H3588><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> speaks <S%H1696><s%> to you, saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Work <S%H5414><s%> a miracle, <S%H4159><s%>' then you shall say <S%H559><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> 'Take <S%H3947><s%> your staff <S%H4294><s%> and throw <S%H7993><s%> [it] down <S%H7993><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> [that] it may become <S%H1961><s%> a serpent. <S%H8577><s%>'"

So Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and thus <S%H3651><s%> they did <S%H6213><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded; <S%H6680><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> threw <S%H7993><s%> his staff <S%H4294><s%> down <S%H7993><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and his servants, <S%H5650><s%> and it became <S%H1961><s%> a serpent. <S%H8577><s%>

Then Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for [the] wise <S%H2450><s%> men <S%H2450><s%> and [the] sorcerers, <S%H3784><s%> and they also, <S%H1571><s%> the magicians <S%H2748><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> the same <S%H3651><s%> with their secret <S%H3909><s%> arts. <S%H3909><s%>

For each <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> threw <S%H7993><s%> down <S%H7993><s%> his staff <S%H4294><s%> and they turned <S%H1961><s%> into serpents. <S%H8577><s%> But Aaron's staff <S%H4294><s%> swallowed <S%H1104><s%> up their staffs. <S%H4294><s%>
Yet Pharaoh's heart <S%H3820><s%> was hardened, <S%H2388><s%> and he did not listen <S%H8085><s%> to them, as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had said. <S%H1696><s%>

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Pharaoh's heart <S%H3820><s%> is stubborn; <S%H3515><s%> he refuses <S%H3985><s%> to let <S%H7971><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> go. <S%H7971><s%>

"Go <S%H1980><s%> to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%> as he is going <S%H3318><s%> out to the water, <S%H4325><s%> and station <S%H5324><s%> yourself <S%H5324><s%> to meet <S%H7122><s%> him on the bank <S%H8193><s%> of the Nile; <S%H2975><s%> and you shall take <S%H3947><s%> in your hand <S%H3027><s%> the staff <S%H4294><s%> that was turned <S%H2015><s%> into a serpent. <S%H5175><s%>

"And you will say <S%H559><s%> to him, 'The Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of the Hebrews, <S%H5680><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> me to you, saying, <S%H559><s%> "Let <S%H7971><s%> My people <S%H5971><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> that they may serve <S%H5647><s%> Me in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%> But behold, <S%H2009><s%> you have not listened <S%H8085><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> now. <S%H3541><s%> "

'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "By this <S%H2088><s%> you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord: <S%H3068><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will strike <S%H5221><s%> the water <S%H4325><s%> that is in the Nile <S%H2975><s%> with the staff <S%H4294><s%> that is in my hand, <S%H3027><s%> and it shall be turned <S%H2015><s%> to blood. <S%H1818><s%>

"And the fish <S%H1710><s%> that are in the Nile <S%H2975><s%> will die, <S%H4191><s%> and the Nile <S%H2975><s%> will become <S%H887><s%> foul; <S%H887><s%> and the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> will find <S%H3811><s%> difficulty <S%H3811><s%> in drinking <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> from the Nile. <S%H2975><s%>"' "

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Say <S%H559><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> 'Take <S%H3947><s%> your staff <S%H4294><s%> and stretch <S%H5186><s%> out your hand <S%H3027><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> their rivers, <S%H5104><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> their streams, <S%H2975><s%> and over <S%H5921><s%> their pools, <S%H98><s%> and over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their reservoirs <S%H9288><s%> of water, <S%H4325><s%> that they may become <S%H1961><s%> blood; <S%H1818><s%> and there shall be blood <S%H1818><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> both in [vessels of] wood <S%H6086><s%> and in [vessels of] stone. <S%H68><s%>'"

So Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> even <S%H3651><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded. <S%H6680><s%> And he lifted <S%H7311><s%> up the staff <S%H4294><s%> and struck <S%H5221><s%> the water <S%H4325><s%> that [was] in the Nile, <S%H2975><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of his servants, <S%H5650><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the water <S%H4325><s%> that [was] in the Nile <S%H2975><s%> was turned <S%H2015><s%> to blood. <S%H1818><s%>

And the fish <S%H1710><s%> that [were] in the Nile <S%H2975><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> and the Nile <S%H2975><s%> became <S%H887><s%> foul, <S%H887><s%> so that the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> could <S%H3201><s%> not drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> from the Nile. <S%H2975><s%> And the blood <S%H1818><s%> was through all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

But the magicians <S%H2748><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> the same <S%H3651><s%> with their secret <S%H3909><s%> arts; <S%H3909><s%> and Pharaoh's heart <S%H3820><s%> was hardened, <S%H2388><s%> and he did not listen <S%H8085><s%> to them, as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had said. <S%H1696><s%>
Then Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> turned <S%H6437><s%> and went <S%H935><s%> into his house <S%H1004><s%> with no <S%H3808><s%> concern <S%H7896><s%> <S%H3820><s%> even <S%H1571><s%> for this. <S%H2088><s%>

So all <S%H3605><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> dug <S%H2658><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> the Nile <S%H2975><s%> for water <S%H4325><s%> to drink, <S%H8354><s%> for they could <S%H3201><s%> not drink <S%H8354><s%> of the water <S%H4325><s%> of the Nile. <S%H2975><s%>
And seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> passed <S%H4390><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had struck <S%H5221><s%> the Nile. <S%H2975><s%>
